items.title: Generic container for items in a dataset
items.description: A JSON array or object property containing one or more items in a dataset or data structure within a dataset.

doi.title: Digital Object Identifier
doi.description: A digital object identifier for or associated with a record. May be in the form of an HTTP url or a standalone identifier.

resolvable_identifier.title: Resolvable Identifier
resolvable_identifier.description: Some form of resolvable identifier for a record that returns a response when accessed over an included protocol such as HTTP. May or may not provide for content negotiation.

citation_string.title: Citation String
citation_string.description: A citation string directly associated with a resource record. Can be any parseable citation string.

record_date.title: The date that a record was considered valid from its source
record_date.description: A date supplied by a record source indicating when it was considered valid or current.

document_title.title: The title for a document of any type
document_title.description: A generic property used to hold the title for a document.

document_link.title: A web link (URL) to access a document online
document_link.description: A generic property used to hold a resolvable link to a document of any type.

publication_date.title: Date that a document or article was published
publication_date.description: A generic property used to hold a date at multiple levels of precision that a document or article was published.

date_created.title: Date Created
date_created.description: Date/time at various levels of precision and formatting that a record was created standardized from source information.

date_modified.title: Date Modified
date_modified.description: Date/time at various levels of precision and formatting that a record was modified standardized from source information.

biological_taxonomy.title: Biological Taxonomy
biological_taxonomy.description: An array containing the full taxonomic hierarchy for the subject taxon with rank and name standardized into a useful form from source data.

rank.title: Taxonomic Rank
rank.description: The specific rank in the taxonomic hierarchy.

name.title: Taxonomic Name
name.description: The scientific name at the hierarchical rank.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: An object or array that contains context-specific parameters as key/value pairs used as input to generate a record in a dataset.

processing_metadata.title: Object containing information about the processing of a record in a dataset
processing_metadata.description: A container object that contains properties describing the specific processing details for a given record within a dataset. Contains standardized properties describing the processing.

status.title: The overall status of the record processing step
status.description: Describes one of three standardized states for the processing of a given record.

date_processed.title: The data and time that the process for a given record was conducted
date_processed.description: Date time stamp in ISO8601 format denoting the point when the processing of the record occurred. Can be used to evaluate record currency with original source and trigger updates.

api.title: A resolvable API string used to obtain or generate a record in a dataset
api.description: Some form of resolvable Application Programming Interface such as a REST URL that was used to generate the record being documented. Often passed through a function of some kind to process the results.

status_message.title: Message with further details about the status of a record
status_message.description: Per dataset, this string contains context-specific details about the status or state of a record that was processed.

details.title: Data Processing Details
details.description: A list of statements describing additional specific details about the process of generating a record.

title: ECOS Species Web Scrape Collection
description: A dataset containing species information scraped from the USFWS Ecological Conservation Online System web pages. Certain properties on species from the USFWS databases could not be accessed through any other open API. Data were assembled using a function build into the experimental bispy software package (https://github.com/usgs-bcb/bispy).

ecos_species_summary.title: ECOS Species Summary Information
ecos_species_summary.description: An object containing all of the accessible and useful information bits, including lists of available documents, from an ECOS Species web page.

ITIS TSN.title: ITIS Taxonomic Serial Number
ITIS TSN.description: The Taxonomic Serial Number from the Integrated Taxonomic Information System associated with the ECOS species record (ref: http://www.itis.gov).

Scientific Name.title: Scientific name for a biological species
Scientific Name.description: The scientific or latin name for a species that was used as an input parameter to an API

Common Name.title: Common or vernacular name for a biological species
Common Name.description: The provided common name for the species.

Current Listing Status Summary.title: Current Listing Status
Current Listing Status Summary.description: Species may have one or more listing status designations. The values for these items were scraped and slightly transformed from a table on the web pages.

items.title: Generic container for items in a dataset
items.description: A JSON array or object property containing one or more items in a dataset

Status.title: Listing Status
Status.description: The listing status designation. Species may have more than one listing status for different populations.

Date Listed.title: Date Listed
Date Listed.description: Date the listing status was applied

Lead Region.title: Lead FWS Region
Lead Region.description: The lead USFWS Region responsible for the species listing process.

Lead Region_link.title: Lead Region Link
Lead Region_link.description: Web link (URL) to the lead region extracted from the text.

Where Listed.title: Where Listed
Where Listed.description: An indication of where, geographically, the species is listed.

Federal Register Documents.title: Federal Register Documents
Federal Register Documents.description: A listing of the Federal Register documents associated with the species listing process, extracted from a table generated on the web pages.

items.title: Generic container for items in a dataset
items.description: A JSON array or object property containing one or more items in a dataset

Citation Page.title: Citation Page
Citation Page.description: The citation location in the Federal Register notice.

Special Rule Publications.title: Special Rule Publications
Special Rule Publications.description: Documents describing special rules published in the Federal Register.

items.title: Generic container for items in a dataset
items.description: A JSON array or object property containing one or more items in a dataset

Citation Page.title: Citation Page
Citation Page.description: The citation location in the Federal Register notice.

Current Recovery Plan(s).title: Current Recovery Plans
Current Recovery Plan(s).description: A listing of documents containing recovery plans for the species

items.title: Generic container for items in a dataset
items.description: A JSON array or object property containing one or more items in a dataset

Plan Action Status.title: The Plan action status Schema
Plan Action Status.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

Plan Action Status_link.title: The Plan action status_link Schema
Plan Action Status_link.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

Plan Status.title: The Plan status Schema
Plan Status.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

Other Recovery Documents.title: Other Recovery Documents
Other Recovery Documents.description: A listing of other documents associated with recovery of the species.

items.title: Generic container for items in a dataset
items.description: A JSON array or object property containing one or more items in a dataset

Citation Page.title: Citation Page
Citation Page.description: The citation location in the Federal Register notice.

Document Type.title: Document Type
Document Type.description: A text description of the document type.

Habitat Conservation Plans (HCP).title: Habitat Conservation Plans
Habitat Conservation Plans (HCP).description: A listing of the Habitat Conservation Plans and available links for the species

items.title: Generic container for items in a dataset
items.description: A JSON array or object property containing one or more items in a dataset

HCP Plan Summaries.title: HCP Summary Statement
HCP Plan Summaries.description: A summary statement for the Habitat Conservation Plan
examples: Boise Cascade Low-effect HCP for the Northern Spotted Owl (transferred to Boise Central Washington Land & Timber , LLC.  Permit was subsequently transferred to Western Pacific Timberlands, LLC.)

HCP Plan Summaries_link.title: HCP Link
HCP Plan Summaries_link.description: A web link (URL) to the Habitat Conservation Plan.

Five Year Review.title: Five Year Review
Five Year Review.description: A listing of Five-year reviews available for the species.

items.title: The Items Schema
items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
